climatePledgeFriendly.details: Cradle to Cradle Certified products are made with safer materials and responsible processes to positively impact people and our planet. SILVER ACHIEVEMENT LEVEL

features: Rich Conditioner for Dry Hair: This hydrating hair conditioner detangles and smooths wet hair while providing stands with intense moisture and shine. Packaging May Vary. What you receive may not be what is reflected on site

Moisturizing Conditioner Formula: Our curly hair conditioner hydrates hair with its blend of Shea Butter, Vanilla and Lavender. Our hair conditioner for damaged dry hair allows for smooth detangling while infusing hair with natural shine

Wavy, Coily and Curly Hair Products: The Black Vanilla Line infuses hair with softness and shine with moisture rich recipes to revive dry, brittle hair. Created for natural hair with 4C, 4B, 4A, 3C, 3B, 3A, 2C, 2B, 2A curl types

Shampoo and Conditioner Hair Care Routine: After rinsing out shampoo, massage the moisturizing and hydrating conditioner throughout your stands. Leave in for 3 to 5 minutes and rinse well. Can be used daily and as a co-wash

Black Woman Founded: Lisa Price founded Carol's Daughter in her Brooklyn kitchen in 1993. She created this collection of hair products to help natural hair regain its natural balance of moisture, manageability, shine and softness
body.description: You can instantly put an end to dry, dull, brittle hair. When you naturally balance hair’s moisture - manageability, softness and shine are just around the corner. This rich hydrating conditioner can do just that, plus it detangles and makes hair easier to style. The blend of Pro-Vitamin B5 and Biotin strengthens and softens hair when it’s wet so there are fewer snags, snaps and tugs. And, it’s light enough to use daily and is also perfect as a co-wash. • Replenishes Moisture • Improves Manageability • Adds Shine • No Parabens, No Mineral Oil, No Artifical Colors, No Petrolatum Packaging may vary Moisture & Shine After shampooing, work thoroughly into wet hair. Massage gently into your scalp and hair, especially the ends. Leave in your hair for 3 to 5 minutes and rinse well. Caution: Keep out of eyes. Not intended for internal use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best conditioner for curly, brittle hair
reviews.reviewText: I stumbled upon this brand when hunting for a better conditioner for my curly hair. I was so impressed with this conditioner I haven’t purchased another brand since. My hair is so soft and tangle free that I can run my fingers through it. My curls looks AWESOME too! The scents are incredible. I have shoulder length, curly hair. I can’t say enough good things about this brand. I wish I had found it 20 years ago. I’ve also implemented the shampoo and curl crème from this brand. It’s a knock out system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can make the dullest, over processed hair soft and shine!
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic conditioner for dry, color processed hair. I have longer curly hair that is very dry. I have color treated my hair for 20 yrs (highlighting since I was a teen) and it has taken it's toll. My hair is course and lacks that luster/shine we all seek. After years of trying traditional conditioners (it seems every product has a line) with little satisfaction, I thought outside the box. I went to my local Target, went for the small and often neglected multicultural section of beauty products and bought several different brands. I am embarrassed to say, that it never dawned on me prior to that. I purchased leave in conditioners, hair masks, creams, sprays and good old conditioner.Methodically I tried each product in hopes of a soft, bouncy, hydrated curls. Carols Daughter Vanilla conditioner nailed it. My hair is silk soft and manageable with this product. I only need a dab the size of a quarter to half dollar and let it soak in while I shave or loofa. Just a minute or two and rinse. My hair is easy to comb through, smells outstanding and shines! Yes, the dull, course over processed hair shines. This stuff is impressive and worth every penny.On a side note, although I love this conditioner, I am not a huge fan of the shampoo in this line or spray leave in conditioner. The shampoo feels thick and my hair doesn't feel clean. The consistency, while probably good for my hair feels oily and it is as if I can't wash it out? The leave in conditioner smells amazing, but I don't really see or feel a difference in my hair when I use it.As for where to purchase, Walmart and Amazon seem to be neck an neck on price. It varies by a few pennies depending on when it's purchased. Target is always $1 to $2 more per bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves my hair super soft
reviews.reviewText: I'm amazed at how soft this conditioner leaves my hair. It's also helpful in the detangling process. I'm very pleased with the scent, too. I will always use this brand for my hair care needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells Nice but Not Hydrating Enough
reviews.reviewText: I bought this while I was trying different conditioners and I like it! It has a nice vanilla scent that’s not too overwhelming and leaves my curly hair feeling soft and smelling nice. Though it was a good price and I like it, I will likely not be purchasing it again because it did not sufficiently hydrate my hair and left it still feeling dry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works good and I like the smell
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner has worked amazing for me ever since I found it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought because it was va illa scent
reviews.reviewText: Made my perm curly again, smells great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too thick for my hair
reviews.reviewText: I bought the product because I love vanilla and in that regard, it did not disappoint. It smells great and the scent lingers. The conditioner feels soft and creamy. It worked great the first couple of times I used it. But it does not detangle my hair easily unless I use quite a bit of it, which wears my hair down. And it does not much for my frizz. I'll work through the bottle but I don't think I'll be buying it again. This is not a good fit for my curly/wavy thick hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hydrating for my dry hair! My hair has felt so great!
Oh my goodness, my hair feels so good and hardly any frizz at all. It does as promised, I am not a huge fan of vanilla scent, but took a risk. It smells really nice and it's not overpowering at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I haven't found a 5 minute rinse out conditioner that does a job like this as yet. Very ideal for wash and go. Extremely good for Co-Wash.
Excellent Produit pour les cheveux.Je l’utilise pour pour effectuer le soin LOCil est super et l’odeur est agréable.
Gutes Produkt, kam zeitlich an.Jedoch war wohl ein kleines bisschen versonnen, da die falsche leicht klebrig war.Aber das Shampoo an sich ist gut.

My hair have never been better since using the ginger shampoo, black raspberry conditioner, and ginger leave-in conditioner.I wasn't a huge fan of how this smells going on, but it isn't bad. My hair does smell nice after using this.Quality of container is good and the delivery packaging was enough to prevent spillage.Great product, would recommend.
